item.title: Functional Programming in C#: The Practical Parts
item.description: Functional programming patterns can make your C# code safer and more maintainable, without getting lost in academic theory. Learn practical patterns you can use today to write better code. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/functional-programming-in-csharp-the-practical-parts
